MergeResults.query: select "FirstName", "LastName","Status","Specialty" from static."OMAccount" where "UniqueIntegrationId" in ('CHRISTOPOULOS-GN','EVANS-WB','NO-KJ','RIZVI-ZH') order by "UniqueIntegrationId"

OCEResults.sfQuery: select Name, DeveloperName from Territory2 where DeveloperName ='O{{ScenarioTerritory.SOMTerritoryId__c}}'
